dublinCore.dc:title: 113 S239 IS: To extend the frontier extended stay clinic demonstration.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Murkowski (for herself and Mr. Begich) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance

form.official-title: To extend the frontier extended stay clinic demonstration.

section.header: Extension of the frontier extended stay clinic demonstration

subsection.text: Section 434 of the Medicare Prescription Drug, Improvement, and Modernization Act of 2003 (42 U.S.C. 1395x note) is amended—

subparagraph.text: in the heading, by striking Three-Year Period and inserting Duration; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (f), by striking the date that is 1 year after the date on which the demonstration project concludes and inserting April 15, 2014.

subsection.header: Funding for the Office of Rural Health Policy to support frontier extended stay clinics
subsection.text: Out of funds in the treasury not otherwise appropriated, there are appropriated to the Secretary of Health and Human Services $1,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2013, 2014, and 2015, for Rural Health Research/Policy Development within the Office of Rural Health Policy to support frontier extended stay clinics. Amounts appropriated pursuant to the preceding sentence shall remain available until expended.
